attributes.action: Hold a General Election by MPs passing a no confidence motion on the Government.
attributes.additional_details: Following the EU referendum, the resignation of the PM, and the calls for the Labour leader to stand down, the nation is facing a constituional crisis and a loss of legitimate leadership. This petition calls on all of our MPs to pass a motion of no confidence in the Government which would trigger an early General Election where parties and candidates can clearly express their position on the future of our nation.
attributes.background: This petition calls on all of our MPs to pass a motion of no confidence in the Government which would trigger an early General Election where parties and candidates can clearly express their position on the future of our nation.
